content: row of red knitting fig 2 again leaving this loose for now next take your small circle of felt and place at the back of the work behind where you plan to embroider the face using black yarn embroider a small nose in centre of face - i use one horizontal stitch and one small vertical stitch fig 3 to add the eyes embroider two small vertical stitches either side of the nose if you wish you can tie a small knot in the thread to make the eyes stand out knot the black thread ends securely at the back of the work and trim off the excess fig 4 take the length of ribbon double it over and tie a knot at the cut ends to form a hanging loop position the knotted end of this ribbon loop so that it is behind the face pull the strong yarn ends at the very top of the head to begin gathering it in and once you are happy with the position of the ribbon pull the yarn ends tightly fully gathering in the top of head and trapping the knotted end of the ribbon inside the head tie the strong yarn tails together securely fig 5 and leave the tail ends inside the head begin joining the seam down the back of the head using the cast off tail end of yarn c when you reach the bottom of the yarn c section take a small piece of toy stuffing and use it to firmly stuff the head then take up the pair of strong yarn ends at the intersection between the head and body and pull them very tightly to gather in the neck tie them off securely and poke the tail ends inside the body leaving them long will reduce the risk of the knot loosening fig 4 fig 5 fig 6 fig 7 © copyright 2006 all rights reserved j u l i e w i l l i a m s l i t t l e c o t t o n r a b b i t s page 3 next thread the tapestry needle with the yarn a tail end from the top of the body and use this to continue seaming down the rest of the body to the cast on edge fig 6 stuff the body cavity and join the seam at the bottom of the dress by sewing through the purl loops inside the body from the back of the second row up which gives a nice flared out edge to the bottom of the dress fig 7 next make the limbs a r m s & l e g s make four the same please note the arms are sewn to the sides of the body below the neck and the legs are sewn underneath the skirt cast on 4 stitches with the pair of double pointed needles and work a short i-cord of around 6 row in length
